channel.title: Puzzle Logic - industry city sleepers [DnB / Downtempo]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/icsleepers/puzzle-logic
Been plugging away at this for a bit now. Some more drum and bass, got some string samples out of GarageBand and various weirdness out of blocs wave. Open for comments and criticism per the usual :slight_smile:
Oh real quick, the reason DnB and downtempo is because the part with the strings is happening at half tempo (160 / 2 = 80). Really the whole track is in 160bpm but when you spread things out less aggressively fast

item.title: Puzzle Logic - industry city sleepers [DnB / Downtempo]
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
Really enjoyed this.

In particular, I loved the first minute (which you came back to at the end of the track). Kinda just wanted to stay in that zone really, as it had a lightness to it that I was enjoying.

The transitions at 1m and 1:40m were a bit abrupt for my taste, but overall a sweet track. Thanks.

Read full topic
